metadata.title: CVE-2017-9130 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The faacEncOpen function in libfaac/frame.c in Freeware Advanced Audio Coder (FAAC) 1.28 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (invalid memory read and application crash) via a crafted wav file.

criterions.comment: faac package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.29.7.7-1').
